es.fnl.fsm
Class ExactMatcherBase<E>

java.lang.Object
  es.fnl.fsm.ExactMatcherBase<E>
Direct Known Subclasses:
ExactMatcher, ExactScanner
abstract class ExactMatcherBase<E>
extends Object

A generic DFA for exact pattern matching. The implementations are based on the classical Knuth-Morris-Pratt and Boyer-Moore algorithms to search for exact, sequential patterns.

As this is an exact matcher, elements are compared using equals(Object). Note that the empty pattern is illegal, while a null in the pattern is allowed to match a null in the sequence if at the right position.

Author:
Florian Leitner
